metadata.title: CVE-2010-2641

platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP 10 SP3

metadata.description: Array index error in the VF font parser in the dvi-backend component in Evince 2.32 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via a crafted font in conjunction with a DVI file that is processed by the thumbnailer.
